Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.banking.Textschluessel:
    Removed abstract modifier, added property name constants, added methods setShortDescription(Locale,String) and getLocales(), and made the class implement Comparable. Additionally removed the argument checks for methods setKey(int) and setExtension(int) allowing any integer value to be set as either the key or extension.

    Added method getTextschluessel().

Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.banking.dtaus.LogicalFile:
    Added method addTransaction() deprecating method createTransaction() which was not capable of returning the index of the transaction in the file.
  • org.jdtaus.banking.dtaus.PhysicalFile:
    Updated the documentation of the commit() method clarifying intended usage.
  • org.jdtaus.banking.dtaus.PhysicalFileFactory:
    Added method createPhysicalFile(File,int). Added method analyse(File). Added method getPhysicalFile(File).
Added various missing serial version UID fields for backwards compatibility. Updated to latest mojo releases.

    Updated the internal cache implementation to use a SoftReference to help the garbage collector in OutOfMemoryError situations.

Updated the format of the strings produced by the toString() method of various classes.
